ingredient-information.sestavine: Sodium Palmate& Sodium palm Kernelate, Cocos Nucifera Oil, Parfum, Aqua, Titanium Dioxide, PEG-400, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, glicerin, Cucumis Sativus Fruit extract, Cyperus Rotundus Root Extract, Tertasodium EDTA, Tetradibutly Pentaerithryl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Curcuma root Extract, CI 4700, Ci 61565, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hidroxyisohexyl3-cyclohexene carbodehyde, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronello, Limonene, Linalool, Geraniol.
